title: A Calming Visit to Claude Monet’s Famed Gardens in Giverny
content:
The Water Lilies paintings that French impressionist Claude Monet is most known for were all painted in the garden of his house in Giverny. Pay a relaxing visit to the set of the MBU (Monet Botanical Universe) with this leisurely video. Hereâ€™s another tour of the gardens with music.

See also Monet painting in his gardens, Claude Monetâ€™s War Paintings, and Monetâ€™s Ultraviolet Vision. (via the kid should see this)
